desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.jp: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.zh_cn: 有一天，老师从{cn贝里塔斯}接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往{cn贝里塔斯}部室的途中，老师和{cn游戏开发部}相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，{cf爱丽丝}就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，{cf爱丽丝}也发生了异变。

desc.en: Veritas contacted Sensei directly and said they found a strange stuff. Since no one knew it at Millennium, they asked Sensei to come over and have a look.
desc.jp: Veritas contacted Sensei directly and said they found a strange stuff. Since no one knew it at Millennium, they asked Sensei to come over and have a look.
desc.zh_cn: {cn贝里塔斯}直接联系了老师，说他们找到了一样奇怪的东西。因为问过的人都没见过，所以希望老师来一趟看看。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Before the club room, Sensei found the Game Development Department was invited too. The four said they were coming to seek some inspirations, though Yuzu was pretty uncomfortable to get outside. At the club room, Hare showed everyone a strange-looking robot.
desc.jp: Before the club room, Sensei found the Game Development Department was invited too. The four said they were coming to seek some inspirations, though Yuzu was pretty uncomfortable to get outside. At the club room, Hare showed everyone a strange-looking robot.
desc.zh_cn: 老师到门口时，发现{cn游戏开发部}也受到了邀请。开发部四人表示是为了寻找灵感而来，虽然让一直待在柜子里的{cf柚子}相当不舒服。进去后，{cf晴}向众人展示了一个奇怪的机器人。

desc.en: The Veritas explained that the robots were from the outskirts of the Millennium, with a number totaling more than 20. Momoi was grealy surprised at the sight of it. Veritas tried to start it but failed every time - when Aris began reacting to the robot.
desc.jp: The Veritas explained that the robots were from the outskirts of the Millennium, with a number totaling more than 20. Momoi was grealy surprised at the sight of it. Veritas tried to start it but failed every time - when Aris began reacting to the robot.
desc.zh_cn: {cn贝里塔斯}众人向大家解释，这些机器人来自{sn千年}郊外，且数量超过二十台以上。{cf桃井}等人大受震撼。{cn贝里塔斯}曾尝试使其启动但都以失败告终——就在这时，{cf爱丽丝}突然对这个东西有了反应。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: The robot, alongside Momoi's game console carrying G.Bible, started operating after interacting with Aris. All panicking, Aris suddenly announced that the "AL-1S" completed the booting, and began attacking everyone.
desc.jp: The robot, alongside Momoi's game console carrying G.Bible, started operating after interacting with Aris. All panicking, Aris suddenly announced that the "AL-1S" completed the booting, and began attacking everyone.

举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Aris goes into a frenzy and loses consciousness, destroying the clubroom and attacking everyone in her wake. No one is able to stop Aris and the situation grows critical. At that moment, the C&C appears and knocks her out, then proceeds to defeat the suspicious machine. Everyone breathes a sigh of relief, but then Sensei receives an unexpected piece of news from Midori.
desc.jp: Aris goes into a frenzy and loses consciousness, destroying the clubroom and attacking everyone in her wake. No one is able to stop Aris and the situation grows critical. At that moment, the C&C appears and knocks her out, then proceeds to defeat the suspicious machine. Everyone breathes a sigh of relief, but then Sensei receives an unexpected piece of news from Midori.
desc.zh_cn: 暴走的{cf爱丽丝}失去理智，破坏了部室且攻击了在场的所有人。情况岌岌可危，没有人能阻止{cf爱丽丝}。{cnC&C}突然现身让{cf爱丽丝}昏厥，并且解决了可疑的机器人。正当觉得松一口气时，老师从{cf绿}的口中得知出乎意料之外的消息。

desc.en: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.jp: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.zh_cn: 因未能击倒众人，{cf爱丽丝}重新充能光之剑。{cf真纪}试图阻拦，但遭{cf爱丽丝}反向压制。就在众人束手无策时，一个熟悉的声音出现。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: The Game Development Department arrives at Rio's location and are about to rescue Aris when an unknown being, Key, appears and takes control of Eridu. The results are catastrophic. Rio belatedly tries to sacrifice herself in an attempt to rectify the situation when Noa and Yuuka arrive.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department arrives at Rio's location and are about to rescue Aris when an unknown being, Key, appears and takes control of Eridu. The results are catastrophic. Rio belatedly tries to sacrifice herself in an attempt to rectify the situation when Noa and Yuuka arrive.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}抵达{cf莉音}所在的地方，在准备救出{cf爱丽丝}的瞬间，{cf未来}的存在「Key」出现且掌控了{et埃里都}，局势因此开始步向危机。就在{cf莉音}准备牺牲自己来挽回一切时，{cf乃爱}和{cf优香}出现了。

desc.en: Neru was at her limits after suppressing Toki, and the GDD promised to her that they were sure to bring Aris back.
desc.jp: Neru was at her limits after suppressing Toki, and the GDD promised to her that they were sure to bring Aris back.
desc.zh_cn: {cf宁瑠}成功压制{cf季}。因为身体透支，要求{cn游戏开发部}一定要将{cf爱丽丝}带回来。{cn游戏开发部}三人做了保证。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.jp: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。

desc.en: Rio showed up and said she was lost already. Despite this, Rio still warned Sensei about the dangers that Aris could bring. But Sensei thought that Rio was acting too recklessly and didn't talk to others about these - basically the same with Himari. Meanwhile, Chihiro confirmed Aris' location, and the three rescued her in no time.
desc.jp: Rio showed up and said she was lost already. Despite this, Rio still warned Sensei about the dangers that Aris could bring. But Sensei thought that Rio was acting too recklessly and didn't talk to others about these - basically the same with Himari. Meanwhile, Chihiro confirmed Aris' location, and the three rescued her in no time.
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，{cf莉音}仍然试图警告老师{cf爱丽丝}将会带来的危险，但老师认为{cf莉音}的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与{cf阳葵}的意思基本一致。{cf千寻}此时也确认了{cf爱丽丝}的具体位置，三人立刻将{cf爱丽丝}救了出来。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: What everyone embraced was not Aris, but rather another being, which was called Key. Aris' personality was isolated in the deep databases by Key, and it was Key acting right now. Key disconnected the comm and hacked Eridu, trying to make the city for her use; the army of Divi: Sion started gathering within the city. Rio apologized for her doings, and requested Sensei to leave before Key ever finished it, trying to stop it on her own. At that urgent moment, Yuuka intervened just in time and disconnected the power of Key, forcing it to stop.
desc.jp: What everyone embraced was not Aris, but rather another being, which was called Key. Aris' personality was isolated in the deep databases by Key, and it was Key acting right now. Key disconnected the comm and hacked Eridu, trying to make the city for her use; the army of Divi: Sion started gathering within the city. Rio apologized for her doings, and requested Sensei to leave before Key ever finished it, trying to stop it on her own. At that urgent moment, Yuuka intervened just in time and disconnected the power of Key, forcing it to stop.
desc.zh_cn: 众人迎来的不是{cf爱丽丝}，而是一个名叫“Key”的个体。{cf爱丽丝}的人格被Key隔离在深层数据库中，当前是Key正在行使职责。Key断开了通讯信号，并入侵了{et埃里都}，试图为其所用；Divi:Sion的兵力也开始集中在都市中。{cf莉音}为自己的所作所为道歉，要求老师在Key得逞前离开，试图以自己阻止一切过程。就在千钧一发之际，{cf优香}等人及时插手断开了电源，Key发生错误而无法得逞。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.zh_cn: 在{cf优香}和{cf乃爱}的协助下，{cn游戏开发部}成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当{cn工程师部}和{cn贝里塔斯}等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。{cf桃井}、{cf绿}、{cf柚子}、老师企图在{cf阳葵}的协助下唤醒{cf爱丽丝}，于是便进入了{cf爱丽丝}的精神世界。

desc.en: Noa explained that Yuuka didn't feel well after the conversation and decided to intervene and help. Yuuka lectured Rio, saying that she would be held accountable severely. The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.
desc.jp: Noa explained that Yuuka didn't feel well after the conversation and decided to intervene and help. Yuuka lectured Rio, saying that she would be held accountable severely. The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.
desc.zh_cn: {cf乃爱}解释称，{cf优香}觉得不插手总感觉哪里不对，于是前来协助。{cf优香}呵斥了{cf莉音}，说明会严厉追究她的责任。{cn工程师部}此时也准备就绪，带上了改装好的前卫君MK.2前来协助。Key重启系统，开始重新确保资源并将兵力向中心高塔聚集，受到前卫君和{cn工程师部}干扰。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: When Key still thought she had a chance, Himari appeared suddenly. She said that C&C and Eimi had long been blocking the entrance, and there would be no chance for Key to assemble troops in the tower. Rio was surprised that Himari hadn't escaped, and Himari said she had already anticipated such events.
desc.jp: When Key still thought she had a chance, Himari appeared suddenly. She said that C&C and Eimi had long been blocking the entrance, and there would be no chance for Key to assemble troops in the tower. Rio was surprised that Himari hadn't escaped, and Himari said she had already anticipated such events.
desc.zh_cn: 在Key以为仍有机会时，{cf阳葵}突然出现并解释{cnC&C}和{cf英美}已经将入口堵上，Key无法召集兵力进入高塔。{cf莉音}惊讶于{cf阳葵}竟未逃走，而{cf阳葵}则表示早已对此有所预料。

desc.en: Himari made it clear that under current situation, it is possible that Key would eventually take over Aris' personality. Therefore, the best solution now should be waking Aris up. When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started looking for a break through.
desc.jp: Himari made it clear that under current situation, it is possible that Key would eventually take over Aris' personality. Therefore, the best solution now should be waking Aris up. When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started looking for a break through.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}指出在当前状态下Key有可能会彻底接管{cf爱丽丝}的人格，因而目前的最佳方案应当是将{cf爱丽丝}唤醒。至于如何唤醒，{cf阳葵}提出让{cn游戏开发部}和老师一起潜入机器的意识和数据库中，在那找回{cf爱丽丝}。{cf莉音}指出了其中的危险，但众人义无反顾；在{sn千年}几乎全部有生作战力量的保护下，{cf阳葵}开始寻找其中的突破口。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and Sensei finally find Aris. Calling herself a demon lord, Aris is hesitant to return for fear of hurting others. Encouraged by everyone's supportive words that it's up to her to decide who she wants to be, Aris finally draws the proof of a warrior: Supernova, the Sword of Light.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and Sensei finally find Aris. Calling herself a demon lord, Aris is hesitant to return for fear of hurting others. Encouraged by everyone's supportive words that it's up to her to decide who she wants to be, Aris finally draws the proof of a warrior: Supernova, the Sword of Light.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}和老师终于遇见{cf爱丽丝}了。{cf爱丽丝}说自己是魔王，自己会害大家受伤，因此犹豫是否该回去。但大家都说自己才是自己真正的主人，于是{cf爱丽丝}终于拔出了勇者的证明「光之剑：Supernova」。

desc.en: Sensei ang the GDD arrived at the Aris' deep consciousness, and there they met Aris and Key. The GDD wanted to bring back Aris, but Key appeared suddenly and reminded "princess" of what she had witnessed.
desc.jp: Sensei ang the GDD arrived at the Aris' deep consciousness, and there they met Aris and Key. The GDD wanted to bring back Aris, but Key appeared suddenly and reminded "princess" of what she had witnessed.
desc.zh_cn: 老师和{cn游戏开发部}一行人来到了{cf爱丽丝}的意识深处，在那他们见到了{cf爱丽丝}与Key。开发部想要带{cf爱丽丝}回去，但Key突然出现，并重新提醒“公主”她所见到的一切。

desc.en: On screen, it showed scenes of C&C being besieged by AMAS, Neru confronting Toki, Sensei and others confronting Avant Guard but short on hands, Neru collapsing after being serverly injured - nothing but all their combat scenes. Everyone didn't understand why, but Key said that the "princess" had already knew it herself.
desc.jp: On screen, it showed scenes of C&C being besieged by AMAS, Neru confronting Toki, Sensei and others confronting Avant Guard but short on hands, Neru collapsing after being serverly injured - nothing but all their combat scenes. Everyone didn't understand why, but Key said that the "princess" had already knew it herself.
desc.zh_cn: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的{cnC&C}、与{cf季}对峙的{cf宁瑠}、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、{cf宁瑠}负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。

desc.en: Aris thought about Rio. Aris still held no doubts against the fact that she was in fact a "demon lord", and feared that she would inflict damages on everyone again. She remembered the damage she inflicted on Momoi, the scenes of Midori and Yuzu confronting Rio, and Neru being injured - all was caused by herself, and so she should disappear.
desc.jp: Aris thought about Rio. Aris still held no doubts against the fact that she was in fact a "demon lord", and feared that she would inflict damages on everyone again. She remembered the damage she inflicted on Momoi, the scenes of Midori and Yuzu confronting Rio, and Neru being injured - all was caused by herself, and so she should disappear.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}想起了{cf莉音}。{cf爱丽丝}仍对自己是个“魔王”的概念自信不疑，害怕自己会再次给大家造成伤害。她记得自己给{cf桃井}造成的伤害，{cf柚子}和{cf绿}面对{cf莉音}时的情形，以及{cf宁瑠}前辈负伤的画面——而这全都是她自己造成的，也因此她应当消失。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第140首曲子，以主线故事中与爱丽丝的相关部分而熟知。

desc.en: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140

desc.zh_cn: 这里的未来，似乎看不到了。举例/联想：Alkaline Tears、第140首曲子

desc.en: Momoi suddenly mentioned TSC2 made by everyone and its achievements like winning the Millenium Prize. Momoi didn't believe Aris' sayings, but she believed these facts, believing that Aris was not like that, and stressed the role of Aris in the team. Aris still couldn't understand why they would come to rescue her, and Yuzu pointed it out sharply: just like Aris had said before, the hero would not give up companions. They also mentioned that, no matter "demon lord" or "hero" she may be, they were nothing but only titles, and choosing to be which could only be decided by Aris.
desc.jp: Momoi suddenly mentioned TSC2 made by everyone and its achievements like winning the Millenium Prize. Momoi didn't believe Aris' sayings, but she believed these facts, believing that Aris was not like that, and stressed the role of Aris in the team. Aris still couldn't understand why they would come to rescue her, and Yuzu pointed it out sharply: just like Aris had said before, the hero would not give up companions. They also mentioned that, no matter "demon lord" or "hero" she may be, they were nothing but only titles, and choosing to be which could only be decided by Aris.
desc.zh_cn: {cf桃井}突然提到了{cf爱丽丝}与大家制作的TSC2，提到了它斩获了{sn千年}大赏的种种成就。{cf桃井}不相信{cf爱丽丝}说的话，但她相信这些事实，相信{cf爱丽丝}绝非如此，强调了{cf爱丽丝}在团队中的作用。{cf爱丽丝}仍对所有人来拯救她而不解，而{cf柚子}则一针见血的指了出来：{cf爱丽丝}自己都说过，勇者绝不会放弃同伴。同时他们还提到，无论是魔王还是勇者都只是称号与头衔，真正想成为谁只有{cf爱丽丝}能决定。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.jp: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Everyone wanted to hear Aris' own true words. Being accused as a "demon lord", Aris thought that she would not be able to return to the club, to live and go out adventures with others - but Sensei denied it. Aris hesitated a little, said that she wanted to be a hero, that she dreamed of continuing adventures with GDD and Sensei. Everyone agreed and just said: "Of course. Because we are the Game Development Department!"
desc.jp: Everyone wanted to hear Aris' own true words. Being accused as a "demon lord", Aris thought that she would not be able to return to the club, to live and go out adventures with others - but Sensei denied it. Aris hesitated a little, said that she wanted to be a hero, that she dreamed of continuing adventures with GDD and Sensei. Everyone agreed and just said: "Of course. Because we are the Game Development Department!"
desc.zh_cn: 大家都想听听{cf爱丽丝}的真心话。{cf爱丽丝}因自己已经被冠以“魔王”的身份，自己认定自己无法再回到社团、与大家冒险生活——但老师否定了这一点。{cf爱丽丝}犹豫了一下，说出自己也想成为勇者，与{cn游戏开发部}和老师将冒险继续下去的梦想。而众人则表示——“因为我们可是，{cn游戏开发部}啊！”

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en: Encouraged by everyone, Aris pulled out the Sword of Light stuck in the stone, returning to be a hero. Key looked at Aris in astonishment, hoping that Aris could perform her duties as the "princess". Aris didn't listen, and blew up Key with her Sword of Light.
desc.jp: Encouraged by everyone, Aris pulled out the Sword of Light stuck in the stone, returning to be a hero. Key looked at Aris in astonishment, hoping that Aris could perform her duties as the "princess". Aris didn't listen, and blew up Key with her Sword of Light.
desc.zh_cn: 受到众人鼓励的{cf爱丽丝}拔出了在石头中的光之剑，重新回归勇者身份。Key极其惊愕地看着{cf爱丽丝}，希望{cf爱丽丝}能够行使作为“王女”的职责，但{cf爱丽丝}没听，用光之剑一炮轰了Key。

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: As Key was suppressed in Aris' consciousness, the Divi: Sion army in the city began to disappear, and the Eridu control center was back at normal. Rio was surprised that Sensei and the GDD actually did it, but Sensei only replied that, it was something that GDD could make. Eventually, the three at GDD reunited with Aris.
desc.jp: As Key was suppressed in Aris' consciousness, the Divi: Sion army in the city began to disappear, and the Eridu control center was back at normal. Rio was surprised that Sensei and the GDD actually did it, but Sensei only replied that, it was something that GDD could make. Eventually, the three at GDD reunited with Aris.
desc.zh_cn: 由于{cf爱丽丝}意识中的Key被压制，城中的Divi:Sion军队开始消失，{et埃里都}控制中心也恢复正常。{cf莉音}惊讶于老师等人居然真的做到了，而老师只是轻描淡写地表示这是{cn游戏开发部}所能做到的。最终，{cn游戏开发部}三人与{cf爱丽丝}团聚。

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地發現某個東西的凱薩PMC，以及查覺到異變的對策委員會。聽到愛麗絲的身體沒有任何異常的訊息後，遊戲開發部覺得很開心。另一方面，陽葵確認隱藏足跡的莉音留下的情報。
desc.jp: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地發現某個東西的凱薩PMC，以及查覺到異變的對策委員會。聽到愛麗絲的身體沒有任何異常的訊息後，遊戲開發部覺得很開心。另一方面，陽葵確認隱藏足跡的莉音留下的情報。
desc.zh_cn: 在{sn阿拜多斯}挖掘地发现某个东西的凯萨PMC，以及查觉到异变的{cn对策委员会}。听到{cf爱丽丝}的身体没有任何异常的消息后，{cn游戏开发部}觉得很开心。另一方面，{cf阳葵}确认隐藏足迹的{cf莉音}留下的情报。

desc.en: 阿拜多斯沙漠，那裡駐紮著的PMC士兵似乎挖到了一件大東西。他們立刻聯絡了PMC將軍和聯邦學生會的防衛室。
desc.jp: 阿拜多斯沙漠，那裡駐紮著的PMC士兵似乎挖到了一件大東西。他們立刻聯絡了PMC將軍和聯邦學生會的防衛室。
desc.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}沙漠，那里驻扎着的PMC士兵似乎挖到了一件大东西。他们立刻联系了PMC将军和联邦学生会的防卫室。

desc.en: 白子向對策委員會眾人報告了自己所看見的東西，指出這些天來PMC的軍力移動相當奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜進去看一眼，但被綾音提醒了之前的事情。這時有人提議詢問老師的意見；雖然害怕打擾老師，綾音還是讓老師有時間就來阿拜多斯一趟。
desc.jp: 白子向對策委員會眾人報告了自己所看見的東西，指出這些天來PMC的軍力移動相當奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜進去看一眼，但被綾音提醒了之前的事情。這時有人提議詢問老師的意見；雖然害怕打擾老師，綾音還是讓老師有時間就來阿拜多斯一趟。
desc.zh_cn: {cf白子}向{cn对策委员会}众人报告了自己所看见的东西，指出这些天来PMC的军力移动相当奇怪。大家表示同意。{cf星野}提出不如大家偷偷溜进去看一眼，但被{cf绫音}提醒了之前的事情。这时有人提议询问老师的意见；虽然害怕打扰老师，{cf绫音}还是让老师有时间就来{sn阿拜多斯}一趟。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

name.zh_cn: 真正登上宇宙战舰的那一天

desc.en: 愛麗絲覺得“宇宙勇者”這個主意非常棒，暢想自己登上宇宙戰艦的那一天。據說工程師部正在不斷鑽研中。最後，桃井提出把遊戲換成“太空歌劇”為背景的“彈幕射擊遊戲”，這讓綠不是特別開心。
desc.jp: 愛麗絲覺得“宇宙勇者”這個主意非常棒，暢想自己登上宇宙戰艦的那一天。據說工程師部正在不斷鑽研中。最後，桃井提出把遊戲換成“太空歌劇”為背景的“彈幕射擊遊戲”，這讓綠不是特別開心。
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}觉得“宇宙勇者”这个主意非常棒，畅想自己登上宇宙战舰的那一天。据说{cn工程师部}正在不断钻研中。最后，{cf桃井}提出把游戏换成“太空歌剧”为背景的“弹幕射击游戏”，这让{cf绿}不是特别开心。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.en: Kei一直在暗處看著愛麗絲。Kei理解愛麗絲想要擺脫自己“王女”的身份，但指出命運最終會讓她成為那樣。
desc.jp: Kei一直在暗處看著愛麗絲。Kei理解愛麗絲想要擺脫自己“王女”的身份，但指出命運最終會讓她成為那樣。
desc.zh_cn: Kei一直在暗处看着{cf爱丽丝}。Kei理解{cf爱丽丝}想要摆脱自己“王女”的身份，但指出命运最终会让她成为那样。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: 作為全千年最厲害的駭客，陽葵承擔下了對莉音建造的都市的善後工作――雖然更多像是莉音直接推卸了責任。陽葵訪問了莉音儲存的資料，這才發現她掌握的東西之多，同時也有些理解了她的偏執。
desc.jp: 作為全千年最厲害的駭客，陽葵承擔下了對莉音建造的都市的善後工作――雖然更多像是莉音直接推卸了責任。陽葵訪問了莉音儲存的資料，這才發現她掌握的東西之多，同時也有些理解了她的偏執。
desc.zh_cn: 作为全{sn千年}最厉害的黑客，{cf阳葵}承担下了对{cf莉音}建造的都市的善后工作――虽然更多像是{cf莉音}直接推卸了责任。{cf阳葵}访问了{cf莉音}存储的数据，这才发现她掌握的东西之多，同时也有些理解了她的偏执。

desc.en: 英美突然來到陽葵身邊，她追問“大姐大”究竟說了什麼。陽葵表示具體內容還需要時間，但大概就是要為其他特異現象做好準備，同時基沃託斯要迎來危機之類的。
desc.jp: 英美突然來到陽葵身邊，她追問“大姐大”究竟說了什麼。陽葵表示具體內容還需要時間，但大概就是要為其他特異現象做好準備，同時基沃託斯要迎來危機之類的。
desc.zh_cn: {cf英美}突然来到{cf阳葵}身边，她追问“大姐大”究竟说了什么。{cf阳葵}表示具体内容还需要时间，但大概就是要为{sn其他}特异现象做好准备，同时基沃托斯要迎来危机之类的。

desc.en: 季突然出現在兩人面前，嚇到了兩人。季表示莉音只跟她說了“以後自由生活吧”云云，但她並不知道怎麼做，於是就一直待著這裡。陽葵詢問季加入C&C的情況，季表示前輩們待她很好，但只是還有隔閡。最後陽葵決定，就此事先聯絡夏萊請求幫助。
desc.jp: 季突然出現在兩人面前，嚇到了兩人。季表示莉音只跟她說了“以後自由生活吧”云云，但她並不知道怎麼做，於是就一直待著這裡。陽葵詢問季加入C&C的情況，季表示前輩們待她很好，但只是還有隔閡。最後陽葵決定，就此事先聯絡夏萊請求幫助。
desc.zh_cn: {cf季}突然出现在两人面前，吓到了两人。{cf季}表示{cf莉音}只跟她说了“以后自由生活吧”云云，但她并不知道怎么做，于是就一直待着这里。{cf阳葵}询问{cf季}加入{cnC&C}的情况，{cf季}表示前辈们待她很好，但只是还有隔阂。最后{cf阳葵}决定，就此事先联系{et夏莱}请求帮助。

desc.en: 在外觀如同宇宙戰艦的「生命守護者主艦」上聚集著各個學園的學生。而且Kei警告愛麗絲遠離那艘船。
desc.jp: 在外觀如同宇宙戰艦的「生命守護者主艦」上聚集著各個學園的學生。而且Kei警告愛麗絲遠離那艘船。
desc.zh_cn: 在外观如同宇宙战舰的「生命守护者主舰」上聚集着各个学园的学生。而且Kei警告{cf爱丽丝}远离那艘船。

desc.en: 戰艦上的一切都讓大家感到新奇，一切都像模像樣。琳提到這艘戰艦的規模，認為可能需要大量人手共同協作才能成功，此外對其結構與執行方式尚不清晰。
desc.jp: 戰艦上的一切都讓大家感到新奇，一切都像模像樣。琳提到這艘戰艦的規模，認為可能需要大量人手共同協作才能成功，此外對其結構與執行方式尚不清晰。
desc.zh_cn: 战舰上的一切都让大家感到新奇，一切都像模像样。{cf琳}提到这艘战舰的规模，认为可能需要大量人手共同协作才能成功，此外对其结构与运行方式尚不清晰。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: 陽葵提出請求夏萊的幫助，調動一切可能的力量進行支援；她先與貝裡塔斯的千尋取得聯絡，表示之後可能會非常忙碌。
desc.jp: 陽葵提出請求夏萊的幫助，調動一切可能的力量進行支援；她先與貝裡塔斯的千尋取得聯絡，表示之後可能會非常忙碌。
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}提出请求{et夏莱}的帮助，调动一切可能的力量进行支援；她先与{cn贝里塔斯}的{cf千寻}取得联系，表示之后可能会非常忙碌。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: 工程師部和遊戲開發部登上主艦。工程師部和愛麗絲一見到戰艦就興奮的喊了出來。工程師部已經迫不及待想要對其分析一番，詠葉甚至提到愛麗絲的光之劍終於能被切實地用在宇宙戰艦上了。
desc.jp: 工程師部和遊戲開發部登上主艦。工程師部和愛麗絲一見到戰艦就興奮的喊了出來。工程師部已經迫不及待想要對其分析一番，詠葉甚至提到愛麗絲的光之劍終於能被切實地用在宇宙戰艦上了。
desc.zh_cn: {cn工程师部}和{cn游戏开发部}登上主舰。{cn工程师部}和{cf爱丽丝}一见到战舰就兴奋的喊了出来。{cn工程师部}已经迫不及待想要对其分析一番，{cf咏叶}甚至提到{cf爱丽丝}的光之剑终于能被切实地用在宇宙战舰上了。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: 優香對愛麗絲居然跟著上主艦一事感到驚訝，畢竟她可是曾經向她保證會留在千年，不過立刻招致桃井等人的不滿。優香認為千年應該是最安全的，不過乃愛則表示事情可能並不盡然。正說著話，遊戲開發部四人趁機溜走，優香瞬間慌了，而乃愛則淡淡一笑。
desc.jp: 優香對愛麗絲居然跟著上主艦一事感到驚訝，畢竟她可是曾經向她保證會留在千年，不過立刻招致桃井等人的不滿。優香認為千年應該是最安全的，不過乃愛則表示事情可能並不盡然。正說著話，遊戲開發部四人趁機溜走，優香瞬間慌了，而乃愛則淡淡一笑。
desc.zh_cn: {cf优香}对{cf爱丽丝}居然跟着上主舰一事感到惊讶，毕竟她可是曾经向她保证会留在{sn千年}，不过立刻招致{cf桃井}等人的不满。{cf优香}认为{sn千年}应该是最安全的，不过{cf乃爱}则表示事情可能并不尽然。正说着话，{cn游戏开发部}四人趁机溜走，{cf优香}瞬间慌了，而{cf乃爱}则淡淡一笑。

desc.en: Kei在意識中警告愛麗絲，稱對方不僅身份不明，而且還以某種方法複製了她“阿特拉哈西斯的方舟”的能力。這艘船，是遠古人民為了對抗方舟而生的，因而對她是天然的天敵，對她有著生命威脅。她希望愛麗絲能夠聽她的，儘快離開。
desc.jp: Kei在意識中警告愛麗絲，稱對方不僅身份不明，而且還以某種方法複製了她“阿特拉哈西斯的方舟”的能力。這艘船，是遠古人民為了對抗方舟而生的，因而對她是天然的天敵，對她有著生命威脅。她希望愛麗絲能夠聽她的，儘快離開。
desc.zh_cn: Kei在意识中警告{cf爱丽丝}，称对方不仅身份不明，而且还以某种方法复制了她“阿特拉哈西斯的方舟”的能力。这艘船，是远古人民为了对抗方舟而生的，因而对她是天然的天敌，对她有着生命威胁。她希望{cf爱丽丝}能够听她的，尽快离开。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: 就在莉音和陽葵吵的不可開交之際，愛麗絲突然現身，表示理解了兩人所說的一切――作為無名諸神的王女的她，擁有著啟動另一艘方舟的能力。遊戲開發部眾人想起種種，立刻慌忙勸解愛麗絲不要做自我犧牲。但愛麗絲有自己的話，老師也制止了慌亂的大家。
desc.jp: 就在莉音和陽葵吵的不可開交之際，愛麗絲突然現身，表示理解了兩人所說的一切――作為無名諸神的王女的她，擁有著啟動另一艘方舟的能力。遊戲開發部眾人想起種種，立刻慌忙勸解愛麗絲不要做自我犧牲。但愛麗絲有自己的話，老師也制止了慌亂的大家。
desc.zh_cn: 就在{cf莉音}和{cf阳葵}吵的不可开交之际，{cf爱丽丝}突然现身，表示理解了两人所说的一切――作为无名诸神的王女的她，拥有着启动另一艘方舟的能力。{cn游戏开发部}众人想起种种，立刻慌忙劝解{cf爱丽丝}不要做自我牺牲。但{cf爱丽丝}有自己的话，老师也制止了慌乱的大家。

desc.en: Kei清楚愛麗絲的意圖，表示如果強行重啟方舟，對她將是毀滅性的打擊，甚至可能以生命為代價。愛麗絲指出，如果那樣能幫助大家，那它就將不再是毀滅世界的工具，而是勇者的武器。愛麗絲還希望這麼做能讓莉音與陽葵和好。Kei仍然警告並表示擔憂。
desc.jp: Kei清楚愛麗絲的意圖，表示如果強行重啟方舟，對她將是毀滅性的打擊，甚至可能以生命為代價。愛麗絲指出，如果那樣能幫助大家，那它就將不再是毀滅世界的工具，而是勇者的武器。愛麗絲還希望這麼做能讓莉音與陽葵和好。Kei仍然警告並表示擔憂。
desc.zh_cn: Kei清楚{cf爱丽丝}的意图，表示如果强行重启方舟，对她将是毁灭性的打击，甚至可能以生命为代价。{cf爱丽丝}指出，如果那样能帮助大家，那它就将不再是毁灭世界的工具，而是勇者的武器。{cf爱丽丝}还希望这么做能让{cf莉音}与{cf阳葵}和好。Kei仍然警告并表示担忧。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.jp: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: 愛麗絲向Kei抱歉，表示自己不應該逃避對她的認識，即便她們幾乎不可能互相理解。愛麗絲同情Kei作為毀滅世界的武器的感受，希望Kei能夠真正追求真實的自己，而不是照著自己可能原本並不願意的方向，就像老師對她說的那樣。愛麗絲還覺得，因為Kei是被意外唸錯的名字，這一名字的意義可以被重新定義。Kei似乎明白愛麗絲是想拯救她，而愛麗絲接受了這種解釋，並說“拯救他人，正是勇者的心意所在。”
desc.jp: 愛麗絲向Kei抱歉，表示自己不應該逃避對她的認識，即便她們幾乎不可能互相理解。愛麗絲同情Kei作為毀滅世界的武器的感受，希望Kei能夠真正追求真實的自己，而不是照著自己可能原本並不願意的方向，就像老師對她說的那樣。愛麗絲還覺得，因為Kei是被意外唸錯的名字，這一名字的意義可以被重新定義。Kei似乎明白愛麗絲是想拯救她，而愛麗絲接受了這種解釋，並說“拯救他人，正是勇者的心意所在。”
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}向Kei抱歉，表示自己不应该逃避对她的认识，即便她们几乎不可能互相理解。{cf爱丽丝}同情Kei作为毁灭世界的武器的感受，希望Kei能够真正追求真实的自己，而不是照着自己可能原本并不愿意的方向，就像老师对她说的那样。{cf爱丽丝}还觉得，因为Kei是被意外念错的名字，这一名字的意义可以被重新定义。Kei似乎明白{cf爱丽丝}是想拯救她，而{cf爱丽丝}接受了这种解释，并说“拯救他人，正是勇者的心意所在。”

desc.en: The 140th track in Blue Archive, known for segments related to the character Aris in the main story.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第140首曲子，以主线故事中与爱丽丝的相关部分而熟知。

desc.en: Kei啟動了協議，開始準備方舟的生成。眾人本以為Kei又佔據了愛麗絲的意識，但愛麗絲在一瞬間又變回了原樣。莉音驚訝於愛麗絲竟能設法讓Kei“服從”她，但愛麗絲糾正說，是她“接受”了請求。愛麗絲想要藉助會長的力量，同時希望能見她一面。
desc.jp: Kei啟動了協議，開始準備方舟的生成。眾人本以為Kei又佔據了愛麗絲的意識，但愛麗絲在一瞬間又變回了原樣。莉音驚訝於愛麗絲竟能設法讓Kei“服從”她，但愛麗絲糾正說，是她“接受”了請求。愛麗絲想要藉助會長的力量，同時希望能見她一面。
desc.zh_cn: Kei启动了协议，开始准备方舟的生成。众人本以为Kei又占据了{cf爱丽丝}的意识，但{cf爱丽丝}在一瞬间又变回了原样。{cf莉音}惊讶于{cf爱丽丝}竟能设法让Kei“服从”她，但{cf爱丽丝}纠正说，是她“接受”了请求。{cf爱丽丝}想要借助会长的力量，同时希望能见她一面。

desc.en: 莉音用自己的小機器人將自己的全息影像投射到艦橋上，與愛麗絲交流。莉音對愛麗絲表示抱歉，但有些難以開口；愛麗絲表示感謝，指出莉音已經成為她的同伴；莉音有些驚詫，但愛麗絲表示敵人變朋友的故事可是相當常見。

desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}用自己的小机器人将自己的全息影像投射到舰桥上，与{cf爱丽丝}交流。{cf莉音}对{cf爱丽丝}表示抱歉，但有些难以开口；{cf爱丽丝}表示感谢，指出{cf莉音}已经成为她的同伴；{cf莉音}有些惊诧，但{cf爱丽丝}表示敌人变朋友的故事可是相当常见。

desc.en: 來到艦船末尾，Kei首先搜尋並確保方舟的所有資源可供使用。隨後，Kei宣佈“王女已獲得鑰匙”，而愛麗絲則宣佈以公主的名義，“允許新的聖所在此降臨。”
desc.jp: 來到艦船末尾，Kei首先搜尋並確保方舟的所有資源可供使用。隨後，Kei宣佈“王女已獲得鑰匙”，而愛麗絲則宣佈以公主的名義，“允許新的聖所在此降臨。”
desc.zh_cn: 来到舰船末尾，Kei首先搜索并确保方舟的所有资源可供使用。随后，Kei宣布“王女已获得钥匙”，而{cf爱丽丝}则宣布以公主的名义，“允许新的圣所在此降临。”

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: 藍天上，電光火石之間，愛麗絲以自己的光之劍為原型，改變了生命守護者號。在資料的深處，Kei終於將“王女”尊稱為“愛麗絲”，認可了這一名字的正當性。
desc.jp: 藍天上，電光火石之間，愛麗絲以自己的光之劍為原型，改變了生命守護者號。在資料的深處，Kei終於將“王女”尊稱為“愛麗絲”，認可了這一名字的正當性。
desc.zh_cn: 蓝天上，电光火石之间，{cf爱丽丝}以自己的光之剑为原型，改变了生命守护者号。在数据的深处，Kei终于将“王女”尊称为“{cf爱丽丝}”，认可了这一名字的正当性。

desc.en: 在獲得Kei的力量後進行了重建，「阿特拉哈西斯：Supernova」粉碎了方舟的多次元屏障。生命守護者就這樣全速向前進，成功進入了方舟的內部。
desc.jp: 在獲得Kei的力量後進行了重建，「阿特拉哈西斯：Supernova」粉碎了方舟的多次元屏障。生命守護者就這樣全速向前進，成功進入了方舟的內部。
desc.zh_cn: 在获得Kei的力量后进行了重建，「阿特拉哈西斯：Supernova」粉碎了方舟的多次元屏障。生命守护者就这样全速向前进，成功进入了方舟的内部。

desc.en: 莉音進一步解釋，愛麗絲的方舟與防護罩是同一種東西，因而這並非某種“複製”，應該能夠對其造成干涉。陽葵指出方舟的形態依建造者決定，顯然莉音的是一個堡壘都市，不過愛麗絲的嘛……
desc.jp: 莉音進一步解釋，愛麗絲的方舟與防護罩是同一種東西，因而這並非某種“複製”，應該能夠對其造成干涉。陽葵指出方舟的形態依建造者決定，顯然莉音的是一個堡壘都市，不過愛麗絲的嘛……
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}进一步解释，{cf爱丽丝}的方舟与防护罩是同一种东西，因而这并非某种“复制”，应该能够对其造成干涉。{cf阳葵}指出方舟的形态依建造者决定，显然{cf莉音}的是一个堡垒都市，不过{cf爱丽丝}的嘛……

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 命中的一炮產生了反向衝擊波。衝擊波後，艦長七神琳下令方舟以最大速度前進，試圖突破防護罩。碰撞後，綾音立刻減速。隨後與方舟本體發生碰撞，眾人成功突入進方舟內部。
desc.jp: 命中的一炮產生了反向衝擊波。衝擊波後，艦長七神琳下令方舟以最大速度前進，試圖突破防護罩。碰撞後，綾音立刻減速。隨後與方舟本體發生碰撞，眾人成功突入進方舟內部。
desc.zh_cn: 命中的一炮产生了反向冲击波。冲击波后，舰长七神{cf琳}下令方舟以最大速度前进，试图突破防护罩。碰撞后，{cf绫音}立刻减速。随后与方舟本体发生碰撞，众人成功突入进方舟内部。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 聽到此種讚賞，莉音突然情緒崩潰，離開了通訊，自己在某處辦公室的桌子下抱著頭。
desc.jp: 聽到此種讚賞，莉音突然情緒崩潰，離開了通訊，自己在某處辦公室的桌子下抱著頭。
desc.zh_cn: 听到此种赞赏，{cf莉音}突然情绪崩溃，离开了通讯，自己在某处办公室的桌子下抱着头。

desc.en: Kei與愛麗絲回到了最一開始她們被找到的那個廢墟里。愛麗絲向Kei告別，隨後倒地失去意識――但被Kei及時摟住。Kei這時完全理解了愛麗絲的“勇者”與“勇氣”究竟為何物，並以自己，一個武器，的消失作為代價，救回了愛麗絲；自己卻變成了一個小機器人。
desc.jp: Kei與愛麗絲回到了最一開始她們被找到的那個廢墟里。愛麗絲向Kei告別，隨後倒地失去意識――但被Kei及時摟住。Kei這時完全理解了愛麗絲的“勇者”與“勇氣”究竟為何物，並以自己，一個武器，的消失作為代價，救回了愛麗絲；自己卻變成了一個小機器人。
desc.zh_cn: Kei与{cf爱丽丝}回到了最一开始她们被找到的那个废墟里。{cf爱丽丝}向Kei告别，随后倒地失去意识――但被Kei及时搂住。Kei这时完全理解了{cf爱丽丝}的“勇者”与“勇气”究竟为何物，并以自己，一个武器，的消失作为代价，救回了{cf爱丽丝}；自己却变成了一个小机器人。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green
